about_the_game:
In "Medieval Heroes Gold Hunt - Pirates" immerse yourself in a pirate kingdom of endless riches where your path to fortune lies in your hands—literally! By swiping your pirates, you’ll generate gold and unlock powerful new characters to join your ever-growing roster. Each pirate contributes to your wealth, bringing you closer to ruling the richest pirate kingdom in the realm. Upgrade your pirates to increase their gold-generating abilities and watch your fortune multiply. The more you swipe, the richer you become!

In this DLC, you unlock a pirate-themed set with new characters.

Features:

- Gold Swipe Mechanic: Earn gold by swiping your pirates, with each swipe increasing your wealth.
- Character Unlocks: Purchase and unlock a wide range of pirates, each offering more gold as you progress.
- Pirate Upgrades: Enhance your pirates to boost their gold production and maximize your earnings.
- Letter Click Bonuses: Occasionally, a letter will appear on the screen. Click it to receive a gold boost or a free upgrade, adding an element of surprise to your gameplay.
